alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 03 at 8:38PM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Areas of freezing drizzle tonight will add a trace of additional ice to the storm totals of one quarter to one half inch. In addition, another inch of snow is possible. This will bring total snow and sleet accumulations to two inches in some areas. * WHERE...All of southwest Indiana, western Kentucky, New Madrid and Mississippi counties in southeast Missouri. Massac, Johnson, Pope, Hardin, and Gallatin counties in southeast Illinois. * WHEN...Now through 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are common, mainly from southwest Indiana south across the Pennyrile region of west Kentucky to the Kentucky Lake area. Roads are still very hazardous.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick
